The Wedding Festivities Begin As Priyanka Chopra Shines Bright At Her Bridal Shower!
Priyanka Chopra and Nick Jonas have not yet confirmed their wedding date as of now, but looks like marriage is definitely on the cards soon. They gave a pleasant surprise to their fans announcing their relationship on social media after their Roka ceremony in Mumbai. Will they once again leave fans startled by exchanging the wedding vows in a private ceremony? Only time will tell.
Why do we suspect this? Because Priyanka’s friends -- film producer Mubina Rattonsey and Priyanka’s manager Anjula Acharia -- threw a bridal shower for her recently! Don’t believe us? Take a look at the pictures below.
In a gorgeous white gown, Priyanka was beaming with happiness. The bridal shower, according to US Magazine, took place at Tiffany’s Blue Box Café in New York. Celebs including Kelly Ripa, Lupita Nyong’o and Kevin Jonas among others also graced the occasion.
